effect_data.name: Shadow Vantaged
effect_data.description: Your next melee attack against this target has +15% crit chance.

effect_data.name: Electrocuted Flames
effect_data.description: Target burns with electrical energy.
Target becomes more vulnerable to Fire.
The explosion has a chance to briefly stun affected enemies.
Enemies caught in the blast are shocked, reducing their accuracy.
Overcharges magical circuits, causing the next Fire or Lightning spell to be a guaranteed critical hit with increased damage, but also increases its mana cost slightly.

effect_data.name: Scalded
effect_data.description: Target is scalded, suffering minor continuous damage and reduced accuracy.

effect_data.name: Pressurized
effect_data.description: Target is internally pressurized. Will explode after a short duration or if hit by a Fire spell.

effect_data.name: Explosive Glyph
effect_data.description: An explosive glyph is attached, detonating after a short delay.
Chance to steal mana.
Reduces healing received by 50%.
If target dies, gain bonus Necromancy spell power.

effect_data.name: Taunted
effect_data.description: Must attack the taunter.

effect_data.name: Feared
effect_data.description: Chance to flee or skip turn.

effect_data.name: Minor Fortitude
effect_data.description: Target's Vitality increased slightly.

effect_data.name: Protective Blessing
effect_data.description: Armor increased for allies in the circle.

effect_data.name: Swift Deflection
effect_data.description: Speed increased.

effect_data.name: Duelist's Focus
effect_data.description: Deal +20% damage to the challenged target.

effect_data.name: Empowered
effect_data.description: Damage and Health increased.

effect_data.name: Blurred
effect_data.description: Accuracy reduced.

effect_data.name: Ricochet Dodge
effect_data.description: Dodge increased.

effect_data.name: Unbalanced
effect_data.description: Accuracy reduced.

effect_data.name: Unseen
effect_data.description: Next attack will be dodged.

effect_data.name: Tempo
effect_data.description: Tempo Mastery is cheaper and faster to use.
Transfer 100 mana from the caster to the target ally.
